name: HKBodyTemperatureSensorLocation
desc: Constants that indicate where on the body a temperature reading was taken.

items.name: case other
items.desc: The temperature was taken at a location that is not otherwise in this list.

items.name: case armpit
items.desc: The temperature was taken in the armpit.

items.name: case body
items.desc: The temperature was taken on the body.

items.name: case ear
items.desc: The temperature was taken in the ear.

items.name: case finger
items.desc: The temperature was taken at the finger.

items.name: case gastroIntestinal
items.desc: The temperature was taken inside the gastrointestinal tract.

items.name: case mouth
items.desc: The temperature was taken in the mouth.

items.name: case rectum
items.desc: The temperature was taken in the rectum.

items.name: case toe
items.desc: The temperature was taken at the toe.

items.name: case earDrum
items.desc: The temperature was taken on the eardrum.

items.name: case temporalArtery
items.desc: The temperature was taken at the temporal artery.

items.name: case forehead
items.desc: The temperature was taken on the forehead.
